## Factor

```{r}
train <- read.csv('./train.csv', stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
```

> factor(x, levels, labels=levels,ordered=)

```{r}
sex <- factor(train$Sex)
```

### cut
```{r}
age_labels <- cut(train$Age, breaks=c(0,20,70,100), labels=c("Young","Adult","Old"), include.lowest=TRUE,ordered=TRUE)
# quantile
qa <- quantile(train$Age, c(0,0.2,0.7,1.0), na.rm = TRUE)
age_qu <- cut(train$Age, breaks=qa, labels=c("Young","Adult","Old"), include.lowest=TRUE,ordered=TRUE)
```
